title: Orange Petals in a Storm
description: Part 1 of The Skyla McFee SeriesSkyla is 11 years old and rushing through rain-drenched Hackney, London streets, trying to reach the home that once was hers. Gram is unaware that her ward has escaped the cellar, unaware also of the fate that awaits the child. Will Gram succeed in her plan to steal Skyla's inheritance? Or will Skyla's secret talent to see into the world of shadows help her to outlive her longest night?A tale of magic realism ~ a modern, adventure fairy story for all ages.See Part 2 of the Skyla McFee Exaltation Of A Lily
author: Niamh Clune
